message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, $16,000 is still beyond my budget. I am willing to go up to $14,000. Would this be acceptable?
